replies.msg:
scenario：收集某某快餐店係某一時段(eg:9am-11am)每個customer排隊嘅落order時間，落完order嘅等候時間同埋time interval between 2 customers arrivals
而家問題就係，如果我想用exponential distribution去describe個probability of arrivals，我應該係用no. of observation / total observation time定係total time interval / total observation？
而每個客人落order同等候嘅時間係咪應該都啱用exponential distribution？
因為用histogram plot完三張圖出嚟個shape都似exponential distribution

而家問題就係，如果我想用exponential distribution去describe個probability of between 2 arrivals，我應該係用no. of observation / total observation time定係total time interval / total observation？
而每個客人落order同等候嘅時間係咪應該都啱用exponential distribution？
因為用histogram plot完三張圖出嚟個shape都似exponential distribution

replies.msg: 如果你take waiting time between two arrivals as exponential, then number of arrivals at given period係poisson
